chapters.title: Chapter 29: Homecoming
chapters.info: Adora Aybara, p. 466 (418)—Perrin's eldest sister. She is sixteen, or about four years younger than Perrin. See also Aybara, Carlin; Aybara, Con; Aybara, Deselle; Aybara, Ealsin; Aybara, Eward; Aybara, Joslyn; Aybara, Magde; Aybara, Neain; Aybara, Paetram; Aybara, Perrin.
